text: You dislike the way the White House looks. Such an old building is no place for a sophisticated man like you.

choices.text: I guess it has a lot of cultural value and stuff, lets keep it this way...

text: While working, you suddenly feel uneasy. It feels as if the spirit from Mr. Obamacare is still floating around in this room

choices.text: Do nothing, my ego will kick him out.

text: The Ghost Busters checked the whole building, but could not find anything. The decide to play some funky 80's tune to lighten to mood.

choices.text: Start an affair with her. What's the harm in that?
